mapper.select: select acceptance.*,acceptance.acceptance_id as acceptanceId,v_patrol_info.*,road_hazard.road_hazard_id from acceptance left join application on application.application_id = acceptance.application_id left join road_hazard on road_hazard.road_hazard_id = application.road_hazard left join v_patrol_info on v_patrol_info.patrolResultId = road_hazard.patrol_result_id left join patrol_result on patrol_result.patrol_result_id = road_hazard.patrol_result_id left join sys_dept as a on patrol_result.patrol_organization_id = a.dept_id left join sys_dept as b on a.pid = b.dept_id where acceptance.status = 2 and b.pid = #{deptId}

with tmp as (select acceptance.acceptance_id , acceptance.application_id,acceptance.status from acceptance left join sys_user on acceptance.accept_organisation = sys_user.user_id left join sys_dept on sys_user.dept_id = sys_dept.dept_id where sys_dept.dept_id =#{deptParentId})
select v_patrol_info.*,road_hazard.road_hazard_id,application.application_id,application.status,tmp.acceptance_id,tmp.status as hlStatus,#{roleId} as roleId FROM application LEFT JOIN road_hazard ON road_hazard.road_hazard_id = application.road_hazard LEFT JOIN v_patrol_info ON v_patrol_info.patrolResultId = road_hazard.patrol_result_id LEFT JOIN patrol_result ON road_hazard.patrol_result_id = patrol_result.patrol_result_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept ON sys_dept.dept_id = patrol_result.patrol_organization_id LEFT JOIN tmp on tmp.application_id = application.application_id WHERE sys_dept.pid =#{deptParentId} and sysdate()>application.dateTime order by ISNULL(hlStatus), hlStatus asc

SELECT sys_user.name as name,c.*,application.road_hazard as road_hazard_id from inspection_company as a left join sys_user on sys_user.user_id = a.third_party_id left join acceptance as c on a.application_id = c.application_id and sys_user.user_id = c.accept_organisation left join application on application.application_id = c.application_id where a.application_id=#{applicationId}
